<traits>

</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 230 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

You coax the magic power in your blood to manifest, accessing magic others don’t expect you to have.

<title level="3">Multiclass Sorcerer characters</title>

The sorcerer archetype is a method for anyone to pick up commonly useful spells, such as [_invisibility_](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) and [_haste_](/Spells.aspx?ID=147).
